import "../../fw-cuisining.css"; import React, { useState ,useLocation, useEffect} from 'react'; // Import useState const ProfileForm = () => { // Declare state for each group of checkboxes (1-3 and 4-6) const [selectedGroup1, setSelectedGroup1] = useState(null); // 1-3 const [selectedGroup2, setSelectedGroup2] = useState(null); // 4-6 // Handler for group 1 checkboxes (1-3) const handleGroup1Change = (id) => { setSelectedGroup1(id); // Set the selected checkbox in group 1 }; // Handler for group 2 checkboxes (4-6) const handleGroup2Change = (id) => { setSelectedGroup2(id); // Set the selected checkbox in group 2 }; const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; return ( <>
